caption: A man encounters an elf in front of him. An old man stands in front of a phonograph and turns a few switches. Suddenly, a box appears, and two beams of light fly out of it. He hurries to chase after them. A girl with blue hair comes out of the house, and he spots another girl and rushes over. He tries to escape, crossing the street and narrowly avoiding being hit by a car. The other two girls attempt to find him, but he hides. A boy is at his desk with a black cat underneath. A man rushes into a church with a wedding ring. A police officer is in front of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris. The girl in blue hair enters a room with a large furnace and picks up two balls. The balls suddenly transform into a red little elf.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(What is the style of the movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
